pageContext.claim: “The dishonest media, which has published one false story after another, with no sources, even though they pretend they have them. They make them up in many cases.”
pageContext.analysis: It is unclear what stories Trump is referring to here, but mainstream news organizations do not publish articles with “no sources” and certainly do not “make them up in most cases.” That is grounds for firing. Certainly, sources can be misinformed, and respected news organizations strive to correct or update stories if a mistake has been made.
